: : Hollywood : :

Hollywood nods in agreement to his own idea.

Hollywood:=
  That's right brother, it'll save us having to make it a bombing zone out =
here, and it will just add on to our power!

Sting:  Couldn't agree more, H=
ollywood.

----------------------------------------------------------------=
----------------------
The preceding announcement has been paid for by the =

New World Order


  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: RoboRick007 
  T=
o: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 11:21 PM
  Subje=
ct: Re: nWo base


  : : Razor : :

  He thinks about Hollywood's idea.

  =
Razor: I agree. We can attach to ship directly to the cave entrance. We can=
 use the ship exits on the other side. This way we can use the ships space =
and systems.

  ********************************************************
  =
The preceding has been paid for by the
  New World Order

    ----- Origina=
l Message ----- 
    From: LurkerAbyss 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   =
 Sent: Friday, August 16, 2002 11:05 PM
    Subject: Re: nWo base


    : :=
 Hollywood/Sting : :

    Hollywood turned to look at Diesel and Razor.

  =
  Hollywood:  Oh, hey guys.  The ship has a lot of goodies.  On these disks=
, is every byte of data on this computer, including a map of the whole Eart=
h, and it maps the locations of the transformer factions here too, and othe=
r stuff.  Right now brothers, I'm just checking the quality of the parts of=
 the ship.  It could possible serve useful to attach it to our own base.

 =
   Meanwhile, Sting comes out of his CR Chamber.  He was formerly black and=
 white, and although it was fitting, not only did he get the logo, but all =
the white on him was replaced with red.  He sees that the entrance is open,=
 and exits the base.  He then sees that Diesel, Razor and Hollywood are ins=
ide the ship.  He walks in.

    Sting:  Oh,  hey guys.  What have you done=
 here so far, Hollywood?

    Hollywood:  Oh, nothing much brother, I've co=
ntained all the data stored on the ship onto these disks, and I'm just taki=
ng a look at the equipment.

    ------------------------------------------=
--------------------------------------------
    The preceding announcement=
 has been paid for by the 
    New World Order


      ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
      From: RoboRick007 
      To: Neo Beast Wars 
      Sent: Fr=
iday, August 16, 2002 10:44 PM
      Subject: nWo base


      : : Razor / =
Diesel : :

      Both Razor and Diesel come out of the CR chambers. Razor =
was already black and white, the only change was the nWo logo. Diesel retai=
ned his black and silver, again only the nWo logo was new.

      They look=
ed around seeing that Hollywood was gone.

      Razor: Maybe he is in the =
ship.

      They both walk out and notice that the doors are open. They cl=
imb into the ship.

      Diesel: Find anything worthwhile Hollywood?

    =
  **********************************************************************
  =
    The preceding has been paid for by the
      New World Order
